dc_description_s: These data layers represent nonmetallic mining permits and mining reclamation permits for Monroe County, Wisconsin in 2018. It is a feature class within the geodatabase, NMonroe_Mine_Permits_2018.gdbN. The feature layers included in this geodatabase are NMonroe_Nonmetallic_Mine_Permits_Active_Acres_2018N and NMonroe_Nonmetallic_Mining_Reclamation_Permits_2018N. [The polygons in this layer represent the tax parcels included in nonmetallic mining reclamation permits. The permitted acreage is the acreage of the parcels. The active acres is the acreage currently being mined. The status field shows the status as active, inactive, reclaimed, or cancelled due to no mining activity. Material mined is coded as limestone, frac sand, fill sand, topsoil.]
dct_provenance_s: Arthur H. Robinson Map Library - University of Wisconsin
dc_subject_sm: Mining Industry, Mines and Mineral Resources - Law and Legislation
